ValidationRule.description: If Reassign-Category 1 = Client Level Change-401k, and Reassign-Category 2 = Plan Elections - 401k, then Reassign-Category 3 needs to be filled in before saving the case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordTypeId="012700000001U2z", ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c,"Client Level Change - 401k"), ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_2__c ,"Plan Elections - 401k"), ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_3__c ,""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter value for Reassign Category 3
